attributes.action: ensure that elderly people are protected against neglect and cruelty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is intolerable that old people who are vulnerable because they have to be cared for by others, sometimes suffer neglect and abuse. We need immediate and freqent unnanounced spot checks on care homes and nursing homes, by qualified, experienced and knowlegeable persons. We also need to ensure that doctor, health visitor, home help and solicitor services to vulnerable elderly at home are orchestrated by one individual in each case.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
